DOC.brief_summary: Vitamin D2 in chronic dosing will produce less of an elevation of serum 25(OH)D than will the same dose of vitamin D3.
DOC.brief_title: Relative Efficacy of Vitamins D2 and D3 in Adult Humans
DOC.criteria: willingness to withhold supplement use for duration of study willingness to avoid sun exposure for duration of study vitamin D supplement use conditions that affect vitamin D metabolism by the body
DOC.keyword: To determine relative potency of vitamins D2 and D3 under conditions of continuous administration
To determine change in vitamin D content of subcutaneous fat after 12 weeks' administration
